description: after playing for a minute for two, the audio completely jacks up and i have to quit the entire application.
summary: would be awesome if it worked as intended

description: So, at some random point all audio breaks. This is the original shareware version with just the first table "Android".
summary: Otherwise great but that sound glitch!

description: Do not install this! wast of time.

It's a pre-setup of Epic Pinball running in DosBox I presume. The sound works but is not very good, and I'm having a slight v-sync (though I'm sure it's my computer.) If you have experience using DosBox I'm sure you could get the game to run on that with better sound.
summary: Does what's it's supposed to do

description: It's a fun shareware of Epic Pinball. I didn't experience any of the audio problems other people are facing.

It's a pre-setup of Epic Pinball Shareware running in DosBox . The sound works but is not very good, and I'm having a slight v-sync (though I'm sure it's my computer.) I have purchased the original pack from GOG (link in deskription) as an "sh" installer all set up for DosBox and it runs perfectly.
summary: Shareware does its job, the full version on GOG runs flawlessly

description: Complete waste of time. you get to play 1 poorly developed table and they expect you to pay $29-$49 for the rest.

Played this game back in the days of good 'ol DOS on my 486SX 25MHz, and it's the real thing! The soundtrack is (still) just amazing. Don't get freaked out about the so called pricing, those were the prices back in 1993(!). I'm going to check if I can get the rest of the tables!
Great memories w/ my father from 90s. Thank you for saving this awesome game!!
how many games and beer the good days and times
Spent too much time playing this one back in the day
SE QUEDA PILLADO Y LA MUSICA IGUAL.
